titles.title: Though I Walk in the Midst of Trouble

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though I walk in the midst of trouble You will revive me You will stretch forth Your hand against The wrath of my enemy And Your right hand will save me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord will accomplish His plan for me In my weakness You are my strength My song, My victory Your lovingkindness is everlasting{/lang-eng}
